item.title: DevOpsCon 2023
item.description: Intro I have attended a DevOps Conference in Berlin and here I will try to summarize my experience and outtakes from it. This hybrid conference was located – physically – in the heart of Berlin, at Martim Hotel near Friedrichstra√üe S-Bahn station. That location was very well known to me, because it was a changing station from when I went from my university to my work. So, visiting it again after several years was pleasant and nostalgic, and I’m, glad that not much has changed there - not for the worst, at least.
